page.title: 02WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content:
The Women's Institutes at Castle Carrock and Talkin have, respectively, 23 and 2O members. That of Castle Carrock has been meeting once a month for 66 years and its members come from the village and outlying communities.
The programme of both Institues is similar - business followed by a speaker or demonstration. Subjects cover a wide variety of topical issues, crafts, cookery, etc. The evening ends with refreshments.
Visits from, and to, other Institutes take place throughout the year and members also attend events organised by the various committees of the Cumbria Federation.
